nodes.title: What I learned from 35 Hackathons
nodes.excerpt: Update: Now count is at 40 Hackathons What is a Hackathon Hackathon - a usually competitive event in which people work in groups on softwareâ€¦
nodes.description: What I learned from 35 hackathons, why you should participate at hackathons, how to gain experience without a full-time job.
